init.sound_warning:
After starting, the sound and background music will play. 
Click the speaker icon in the upper-right corner to turn off the sound. 
Click the musical note icon in the upper-right corner to turn off the background music.
init.long_description:
gameplays, arts, and sounds are all from "Litter Fighter 2" basically.
created by Marti Wong and Starsky Wong in 1999.

"LF2:Wemake" created by Gim in 2024.

zh-hans.init.sound_warning:
开始后将播放声音，点击右上方喇叭关闭声音
将播放背景音乐，点击右上方音符关闭背景音乐
zh-hans.init.long_description:
大部分玩法、美术、音效音乐来自 "Litter Fighter 2" 
原作：Marti Wong，Starsky Wong.

"LF2:Wemake" created by Gim in 2024.

zh-hant.init.sound_warning:
開始後將播放聲音，點擊右上方喇叭關閉聲音
將播放背景音樂，點擊右上方音符關閉背景音樂
zh-hant.init.long_description:
大部分玩法、美術、音效音樂來自 "Litter Fighter 2" 
原作：Marti Wong，Starsky Wong.

"LF2:Wemake" created by Gim in 2024.
